actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT max(td.test_name), (split_part(max(td.test_name) ,' ',5))::int as test_num, 
	(select array_to_string(array_agg(td.test_name), ', ') from  public.test_details as td 
	left join public.course_test_track as ctt 
	on td.test_id = ctt.test_id 
	where section_id = {{section.selectedOptionValue}} and ctt.chapter_tag= 	{{Table1.triggeredRow.chapter_tag}} and td.test_name like 'School Test %' and ctt.test_schedule_status != 2) as unused_test
FROM public.test_details as td 
left join public.course_test_track as ctt 
on td.test_id = ctt.test_id 
where section_id = {{section.selectedOptionValue}} and ctt.chapter_tag= {{Table1.triggeredRow.chapter_tag}} and td.test_name like 'School Test %'
